descriptionHtml:
A \"port\" of my Shady Fences mod for Oblivion.

The Shady Sam Organization is back, setting up camp at the Holds Stables or just in town.
They Sell 24-7, buy anything, and sell leveled Weapons and Armor.
Their network is busy so they have 20k gold each and thus are very powerful, do not attack them.

Why?
I wanted merchants that I can unload to at all major holds.
I use my Follower & Horse as pack mules & I can haul 645 weight units, that\'s a lot of gear.
Also when I want to \"clear out\" their inventories I can just unload the esp.
Vanilla merchants will sometimes hold on to rare or high cost items forever, letters, bountys, notes, and I find that annoying.

v1: Release, New NPC to all Hold Stables or Towns.
v1.01: Fix Now Shady NPCs will buy and sell ANYTHING including Stolen items. Also gave them actual names, thanks to faeriexdecay
v1.02: Added Wall Lean Markers, moved all chests out of game world.
v1.03: Put names back to more anonymous ones.
v1.04: Added Shady Samantha\'s to Villages and Settlements.
author: E2B2
